faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about the Operations Audit process

items.question: How quickly can I schedule my audit consultation?
items.answer: Most consultations are scheduled within 24-48 hours of purchase. We offer flexible scheduling to accommodate your business hours and can work with your calendar availability.

items.question: What information do I need to prepare for the consultation?
items.answer: We'll send you a brief pre-consultation questionnaire covering your current processes, technology stack, and main challenges. The consultation itself is conversational - no extensive preparation required.

items.question: How detailed is the implementation report?
items.answer: Your 5-page report includes specific recommendations for your top 3 priority areas, a 30-day action plan with checkboxes, ROI projections, and next steps. Everything is customized to your specific operation.

items.question: Can I implement the recommendations myself?
items.answer: Absolutely. The audit is designed to provide actionable insights you can implement immediately. The 30-day action plan includes step-by-step instructions for the most impactful quick wins.

items.question: What if I want help implementing the recommendations?
items.answer: During your follow-up consultation, we'll discuss our Tier 3 implementation services (90-Day CRM Sprint, Operations Playbook Creation, etc.) if you'd like hands-on assistance.

items.question: Is this audit applicable to my specific type of building?
items.answer: This audit is specifically designed for luxury custom home builders with $5M+ annual revenue. Whether you focus on high-end custom homes, luxury spec builds, or premium remodeling, our framework applies.
